name: Dice, I Hate Dice!
description:
We hate dice, so we made game about it...
Destroy dice and escape from this "dice madness". Aim dice with your mouse, pick them up with left click and throw them to destroy.... DESTROY DICE!!! ERASE THEM!! Please do...
p.s. Dice are rolling btw...

Preferable Browser: Google Chrome

Controls:
Movement - ASDW / arrows
Pick up dice / Through dice - Left click
Jump - Space

-----

Made by COLLISION CHECK game studio 

All sprites, animations, mechanics and music theme were made in around 15 hours. 

Collision Check game studio social and contacts: https://twitter.com/CollisionCheckG 

p.s. 
DESTROY DICE!!!
